mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods_order VALUES (order_seq.nextval, 1, 111111, sysdate, sysdate, sysdate, 0, #{seller_idx})
mapper.select: select idx, buyer_idx, seller_idx, order_num, order_date, depart_date, arrive_date, order_status, (select title from bot_category where idx=goods_order.idx) as top_title, (select goods_image from goods_order_item where order_idx = goods_order.idx) as goods_image, (select idx from goods_order_item where order_idx = goods_order.idx) as order_item_idx from goods_order where seller_idx=#{member_idx}

select idx, buyer_idx, seller_idx, order_num, order_date, depart_date, arrive_date, order_status, (select title from bot_category where idx=goods_order.idx) as top_title, (select goods_image from goods_order_item where order_idx = goods_order.idx) as goods_image, (select idx from goods_order_item where order_idx = goods_order.idx) as order_item_idx, (select company_name from sell_authorized where member_idx=seller_idx)as company_name, (select name from member where member_idx=buyer_idx)as buyer_name from goods_order

select goods_image, price, amount, top_title, order_idx, (select zipcode1 from member where member_idx= (select buyer_idx from goods_order where idx=goods_order_item.order_idx)) as zipcode1, (select address1 from member where member_idx= (select buyer_idx from goods_order where idx=goods_order_item.order_idx)) as address1, (select order_status from goods_order where idx = goods_order_item.order_idx) as order_status, (select name from member where member_idx= (select idx from goods_order where idx=goods_order_item.order_idx))as buyer_name
from goods_order_item where idx=#{order_item_idx}
